### Generate Figure 2 in the paper
```{r}
library(tidyr)
legend_font_size = 28
title_size = 32
tick_size = 28
x_axis_label_size = 32
y_axis_label_size = 18
plot_line_size = 3
legend_title_size = 32
coef_hn_rd_so_R = 15
coef_hn_rd_so_Python = 6

# R community

df_first_year = read_csv('./data/media_post_relative_time_com_R_no_so.csv')
df_first_year = subset(df_first_year, creation_year > 2010 & (creation_year < 2018 | project_create_before_201806_flag == TRUE) &
                                      project_history_count >= 365 ) # only keep projects which we have at least one-year of history, and created after year 2010, because early days have few projects

df_repo_has_media_by_year = setNames(aggregate(cbind(df_first_year$mention_on_tw_first_year_flag, df_first_year$mention_on_hn_first_year_flag, df_first_year$mention_on_rd_first_year_flag), by = list(df_first_year$creation_year), FUN = mean), c("year", "Twitter", 'HackerNews', 'Reddit'))

df_repo_has_media_by_year$HackerNews = df_repo_has_media_by_year$HackerNews * coef_hn_rd_so_R
df_repo_has_media_by_year$Reddit = df_repo_has_media_by_year$Reddit * coef_hn_rd_so_R

df_repo_has_media_by_year_long <- df_repo_has_media_by_year %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c('Twitter','HackerNews','Reddit'), 
    names_to = "media",
    values_to = "ratio_mentioned"
)

df_repo_has_media_by_year_long <- df_repo_has_media_by_year_long %>%
  mutate( media=factor(media,levels=c("Twitter", "HackerNews", "Reddit", "Stargazer")) )

p1_R = ggplot(df_repo_has_media_by_year_long,aes(x=year, y=ratio_mentioned, group=media, color=media))+
  geom_line(size = plot_line_size) +
    scale_colour_manual(values = c('Twitter' = "blue",'HackerNews' = "red", 'Reddit' = "orange"))+
    scale_y_continuous(

    # Features of the first axis
    name = "Ratio of projects mentioned on TW",

    # Add a second axis and specify its features
    sec.axis = sec_axis(~.*1.0 / coef_hn_rd_so_R, name="Ratio of projects mentioned on others")
  ) +
  ggtitle("R projects")+
  xlab('year')+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5,size = title_size),
        legend.text = element_text(size=legend_font_size),
        axis.text=element_text(size=tick_size),
        axis.title.x=element_text(size=x_axis_label_size),
        axis.title.y=element_text(size=y_axis_label_size),
        legend.title=element_text(size=legend_title_size))

# Python

df_first_year = read_csv('./data/media_post_relative_time_com_Python_no_so.csv')
df_first_year = subset(df_first_year, creation_year > 2010 & (creation_year < 2018 | project_create_before_201806_flag == TRUE) &
                                      project_history_count >= 365 ) # only keep projects which we have at least one-year of history, and created after year 2010, because early days have few projects


df_repo_has_media_by_year = setNames(aggregate(cbind(df_first_year$mention_on_tw_first_year_flag, df_first_year$mention_on_hn_first_year_flag, df_first_year$mention_on_rd_first_year_flag), by = list(df_first_year$creation_year), FUN = mean), c("year", "Twitter", 'HackerNews', 'Reddit'))

df_repo_has_media_by_year$HackerNews = df_repo_has_media_by_year$HackerNews * coef_hn_rd_so_Python
df_repo_has_media_by_year$Reddit = df_repo_has_media_by_year$Reddit * coef_hn_rd_so_Python

df_repo_has_media_by_year_long <- df_repo_has_media_by_year %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c('Twitter','HackerNews','Reddit'), 
    names_to = "media",
    values_to = "ratio_mentioned"
)

df_repo_has_media_by_year_long <- df_repo_has_media_by_year_long %>%
  mutate( media=factor(media,levels=c("Twitter", "HackerNews", "Reddit", "Stargazer")) )

p2_Python = ggplot(df_repo_has_media_by_year_long,aes(x=year, y=ratio_mentioned, group=media, color=media))+
  geom_line(size = plot_line_size) +
    scale_colour_manual(values = c('Twitter' = "blue",'HackerNews' = "red", 'Reddit' = "orange"))+
    scale_y_continuous(

    # Features of the first axis
    name = "Ratio of projects mentioned on TW",

    # Add a second axis and specify its features
    sec.axis = sec_axis(~.*1.0 / coef_hn_rd_so_Python, name="Ratio of projects mentioned on others")
  ) +
  ggtitle("Python projects")+
  xlab('year')+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5,size = title_size),
        legend.text = element_text(size=legend_font_size),
        axis.text=element_text(size=tick_size),
        axis.title.x=element_text(size=x_axis_label_size),
        axis.title.y=element_text(size=y_axis_label_size),
        legend.title=element_text(size=legend_title_size))

ggarrange(p1_R, p2_Python, nrow=2, common.legend = TRUE, legend="right")

ggsave(file="./figure/ratio_being_posted.pdf", width=16, height=12, dpi=300)
```

### Generate Figure 3 in the paper
```{r}
library(tidyr)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(ggpubr)
legend_font_size = 20
title_size = 32
y_tick_size = 22
x_tick_size = 32
axis_label_size = 24
node_size = 4
coef_hn_rd_so = 20
coef_hn_rd_Python = 4

longitudional_peak_media_R = read_csv('./data/media_post_relative_time_com_R_no_so.csv')
longitudional_peak_devstar_R = read_csv('./data/dev_star_activity_com_R_complete_period.csv')
df_R = merge(longitudional_peak_media_R, longitudional_peak_devstar_R, by = 'repo_slug')

df_R = df_R[c('repo_slug', 'first_rd_time', 'first_hn_time', 'first_tw_time', 'first_stargazer_time')]


df_R_long <- df_R %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c('first_rd_time','first_hn_time', 'first_tw_time', 'first_stargazer_time'), 
    names_to = "type",
    values_to = "first_appear_time"
)

df_R_long[df_R_long$type == "first_rd_time",]$type <- 'Reddit'
df_R_long[df_R_long$type == "first_hn_time",]$type <- 'HackerNews'
df_R_long[df_R_long$type == "first_tw_time",]$type <- 'Twitter'
df_R_long[df_R_long$type == "first_stargazer_time",]$type <- 'Stargazer'
df_R_long[df_R_long$first_appear_time == -1,]$first_appear_time <- NA

df_R_long <- df_R_long %>%
  mutate( type=factor(type,levels=c("Twitter", "HackerNews", "Reddit", "Stargazer")) )


p1_R = ggplot(df_R_long, aes(x=type, y=first_appear_time)) + 
  geom_violin() +
  stat_summary(fun.data=mean_cl_boot, fun.args=list(conf.int=0.95),
                 geom="pointrange", color="red") + ylab('First appear time (in days)') + xlab('')+
  ggtitle("R projects")+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5,size = title_size),
        legend.text = element_text(size=legend_font_size),
        axis.text.x=element_text(size=x_tick_size),
        axis.text.y=element_text(size=y_tick_size),
        axis.title=element_text(size=axis_label_size))


longitudional_peak_media_Python = read_csv('./data/media_post_relative_time_com_Python_no_so.csv')
longitudional_peak_devstar_Python = read_csv('./data/dev_star_activity_com_Python_complete_period.csv')

df_Python = df_Python[c('repo_slug', 'first_rd_time', 'first_hn_time', 'first_tw_time', 'first_stargazer_time')]


df_Python_long <- df_Python %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c('first_rd_time','first_hn_time', 'first_tw_time', 'first_stargazer_time'), 
    names_to = "type",
    values_to = "first_appear_time"
)
df_Python_long[df_Python_long$type == "first_rd_time",]$type <- 'Reddit'
df_Python_long[df_Python_long$type == "first_hn_time",]$type <- 'HackerNews'
df_Python_long[df_Python_long$type == "first_tw_time",]$type <- 'Twitter'
df_Python_long[df_Python_long$type == "first_stargazer_time",]$type <- 'Stargazer'
df_Python_long[df_Python_long$first_appear_time == -1,]$first_appear_time <- NA

df_Python_long <- df_Python_long %>%

p2_Python = ggplot(df_Python_long, aes(x=type, y=first_appear_time)) +
```

### Generate Figure 4 in the paper
```{r}
tick_size = 32
x_axis_label_size = 30
y_axis_label_size = 22
legend_font_size = 28
legend_title_size = 32
coef_hn_rd_so = 50
coef_hn_rd_Python = 20
time_shift_R = read_csv('./data/time_shift_of_platforms_com_R_no_so.csv')
tw_range_R = c(0.97, 1)
other_range_R = c(0, 0.03)
b_R <- diff(tw_range_R)/diff(other_range_R)
a_R <- tw_range_R[1] - b_R*other_range_R[1]


tw_range_Python = c(0.85, 1)
other_range_Python = c(0, 0.05)
b_Python <- diff(tw_range_Python)/diff(other_range_Python)
a_Python <- tw_range_Python[1] - b_Python*other_range_Python[1]


time_shift_R_tw = subset(time_shift_R, media == 'Twitter')
time_shift_R_hn = subset(time_shift_R, media == 'HackerNews')
time_shift_R_hn$average_ratio = time_shift_R_hn$average_ratio * b_R + a_R
time_shift_R_rd = subset(time_shift_R, media == 'Reddit')
time_shift_R_rd$average_ratio = time_shift_R_rd$average_ratio * b_R + a_R


time_shift_R_processed = rbind(time_shift_R_tw, time_shift_R_hn, time_shift_R_rd)

time_shift_R_processed <- time_shift_R_processed %>%
  mutate( time_group=factor(time_group,levels=c("first", "second", "third", "forth")) )

time_shift_R_processed <- time_shift_R_processed %>%
  mutate( media=factor(media,levels=c("Twitter", "HackerNews", "Reddit")) )

p1_R = ggplot(time_shift_R_processed,aes(x=time_group, y=average_ratio, group=media, color=media))+
  geom_line(size = plot_line_size) +
    scale_colour_manual(values = c('Twitter' = "blue",'HackerNews' = "red", 'Reddit' = "orange"))+
    scale_y_continuous(

    # Features of the first axis
    name = "Ratio of posts on TW",

    # Add a second axis and specify its features
    # sec.axis = sec_axis(~.*1.0 / coef_hn_rd_so, name="Ratio of posts on HN, RD, SO")
    sec.axis = sec_axis(~ (. - a_R)/b_R, name="Ratio of posts on others")

  )+
  xlab('Time of post appearance (quantile)')+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5,size = title_size),
        legend.text = element_text(size=legend_font_size),
        axis.text=element_text(size=tick_size),
        axis.title.x=element_text(size=x_axis_label_size),
        axis.title.y=element_text(size=y_axis_label_size),
        legend.title=element_text(size=legend_title_size))+
  ggtitle('R projects')


time_shift_Python = read_csv('./data/time_shift_of_platforms_com_Python_no_so.csv')



time_shift_Python_tw = subset(time_shift_Python, media == 'Twitter')
time_shift_Python_hn = subset(time_shift_Python, media == 'HackerNews')
time_shift_Python_hn$average_ratio = time_shift_Python_hn$average_ratio * b_Python + a_Python
time_shift_Python_rd = subset(time_shift_Python, media == 'Reddit')
time_shift_Python_rd$average_ratio = time_shift_Python_rd$average_ratio * b_Python + a_Python


time_shift_Python_processed = rbind(time_shift_Python_tw, time_shift_Python_hn, time_shift_Python_rd)

time_shift_Python_processed <- time_shift_Python_processed %>%
  mutate( time_group=factor(time_group,levels=c("first", "second", "third", "forth")) )

time_shift_Python_processed <- time_shift_Python_processed %>%
  mutate( media=factor(media,levels=c("Twitter", "HackerNews", "Reddit")) )

p2_Python = ggplot(time_shift_Python_processed,aes(x=time_group, y=average_ratio, group=media, color=media))+
  geom_line(size = plot_line_size) +
    scale_colour_manual(values = c('Twitter' = "blue",'HackerNews' = "red", 'Reddit' = "orange"))+
    scale_y_continuous(

    # Features of the first axis
    name = "Ratio of posts on TW",

    # Add a second axis and specify its features
    # sec.axis = sec_axis(~.*1.0 / coef_hn_rd_Python, name="Ratio of posts on HN, RD, SO")
    sec.axis = sec_axis(~ (. - a_Python)/b_Python, name="Ratio of posts on others")

  )+
  xlab('Time of post appearance (quantile)')+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5,size = title_size),
        legend.text = element_text(size=legend_font_size),
        axis.text=element_text(size=tick_size),
        axis.title.x=element_text(size=x_axis_label_size),
        axis.title.y=element_text(size=y_axis_label_size),
        legend.title=element_text(size=legend_title_size))+
```

### Generate Figure 5 in the paper, step 1, data process
```{r}
library(DescTools)
library(dplyr)
library(boot)
library(hash)
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)
library(relaimpo)
library(gdata)

community_name = 'Python' # R or Python

longitudional_peak_media = read_csv(sprintf('./data/media_post_relative_time_com_%s_no_so.csv', community_name))


longitudional_peak_devstar = read_csv(sprintf('./data/dev_star_activity_com_%s_complete_period.csv', community_name))
df_raw = merge(longitudional_peak_media, longitudional_peak_devstar, by = 'repo_slug')
                                                                                  
df_data = setNames(df_raw[c('repo_slug', 'one_hop_author_within_owner_count', 'two_hop_author_within_owner_count', 'three_hop_author_within_owner_count', 'total_author_at_the_time_count', 'new_author_one_hop_count', 'new_author_two_hop_count', 'new_author_three_hop_count', 'new_author_fourormore_hop_count', 'stargazer_one_hop_count', 'stargazer_two_hop_count', 'stargazer_three_hop_count', 'stargazer_fourormore_hop_count', 'rd_post_count', 'hn_post_count', 'tw_post_count', 'project_history_count')],
                   
c('repo_slug', 'one_hop_gh_user_count', 'two_hop_gh_user_count', 'three_hop_gh_user_count', 'total_gh_user_at_the_time_count', 'one_hop_dev_count', 'two_hop_dev_count', 'three_hop_dev_count', 'fourormore_hop_dev_count', 'one_hop_stargazer_count', 'two_hop_stargazer_count', 'three_hop_stargazer_count', 'fourormore_hop_stargazer_count', 'rd_count', 'hn_count',  'tw_count', 'project_history_count'))

df_data$fourormore_hop_user_count = df_data$total_gh_user_at_the_time_count -  df_data$one_hop_gh_user_count - df_data$two_hop_gh_user_count - df_data$three_hop_gh_user_count

if (community_name == 'R'){
data_no_outlier = subset(df_data, tw_count < exp(4)
                                &  hn_count < exp(1)
                                &  rd_count < exp(1)
                                &  one_hop_stargazer_count < exp(2)
                                &  two_hop_stargazer_count < exp(3)
                                &  three_hop_stargazer_count < exp(3)
                                &  fourormore_hop_stargazer_count < exp(6)
                                &  one_hop_dev_count < exp(2)
                                &  two_hop_dev_count < exp(1.5)
                                &  three_hop_dev_count < exp(1.5)
                                &  fourormore_hop_dev_count < exp(3)
                                &  one_hop_gh_user_count < exp(8)
                                &  two_hop_gh_user_count < exp(12)
                                &  fourormore_hop_user_count > exp(13)
                                &  project_history_count > exp(2))
}else{

data_no_outlier = subset(df_data, tw_count < exp(5)
                                 & hn_count < exp(2)
                                 & rd_count < exp(2)
                                 & one_hop_stargazer_count < exp(2)
                                 & two_hop_stargazer_count < exp(4)
```

```{r}
generate_label <- function(p){
  label = ""
  if (p < 0.001)
  {
    label = '***'
  } else if (p < 0.01){
    label = '**'
  } else if (p < 0.05){
    label = '*'
  }else{
    label = ""
  }
  return(label)
}
```

```{r}
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5,size = title_size),
        legend.text = element_text(size=legend_font_size),
        axis.text.y=element_text(size=y_tick_size),
        axis.text.x=element_text(size=x_tick_size),
        axis.title=element_text(size=axis_label_size),
        axis.title.y = element_blank(),
        axis.title.x = element_blank(),
        legend.title=element_text(size=legend_title_size))+
     geom_text(aes(x = c(width_middle - 1.5 *width_adjust, width_middle - 0.5 * width_adjust, width_middle + 0.5 * width_adjust, width_middle + 1.5 * width_adjust), label = c(rd_onehop_dev_label, rd_twohop_dev_label, rd_threehop_dev_label, rd_fourormore_hop_dev_label)), vjust = height_adjust, colour = "black", size = significance_level_text_size)+ 
  scale_x_discrete(labels = c( 'Reddit'))



p_star = ggarrange(p1_tw_star, p2_hn_star,p3_rd_star, ncol=3, nrow=1, common.legend = TRUE, legend="right") 
p_star = annotate_figure(p_star, top = text_grob("Stargazer", 
               color = "black", face = "bold", size = 36, hjust = hjust_length))

p_dev = ggarrange(p4_tw_dev, p5_hn_dev,p6_rd_dev, ncol=3, nrow=1, common.legend = TRUE, legend="right") 
p_dev = annotate_figure(p_dev, top = text_grob("Contributor", 
               color = "black", face = "bold", size = 36, hjust = hjust_length))

ggarrange(p_star, p_dev, ncol=1, nrow=2, common.legend = TRUE, legend="right")
```
